fields.name: Active Skill: Dragon Swoop
fields.value:
• Davison will swoop to the ground, knocking back enemy units and stunning them.
• Range: 5

fields.name: Passive Skill: Dragon Blood
fields.value:
• Davison will increase the attack and health of all allied units.
• Davison and allied units will reflect a percentage of damage from enemy’s basic attacks.
• When Cactus reflect damage, the reflection percentages are added.

fields.name: Legendary Skill: Dragon Rage
fields.value:
• After 4 basic attacks, awakened Davison will breathe fire and damage enemy units within range.
• Damage (basic): 850/920/1000/1080/1020
• Damage (fire breath): 1000/1250/1500/1750/2000; Range: 6×8

When Davison cumulatively loses 50% of his life,
• he will become enraged and release his <Dragon Swoop> active skill once,
• he gains damage immunity (50%/55%/60%/65%/70%), and
• his baisc attack becomes fire breathe (Damage: 850/920/1000/1080/1020; Range: 6×8)
